bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Faust Club was formed in 1872 as a social club for Brooklyn artists, actors, musicians, and journalists. The Club was located at a house on Remsen Street, but dissolved in 1875 due to depleted finances.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This collection includes materials documenting the activities of the Faust Club from 1872 to 1875, including a minute book, correspondence, a directory with lists of members and committees, and an account book with a name index.
